summary: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.
cast: Cole Hauser|Eddie Cibrian|Morris Chestnut|Lena Headey|Piper Perabo|Rick Ravanello|Daniel Dae Kim|Kieran Darcy-Smith|Marcel Iures|Vlad Radescu|Simon Kunz|David Kennedy|Alin Panc|Zoltan Butuc|Brian Steele
title: La caverna maldita
